achievements.name: Annihilation over Attrition
achievements.description: Play 250 Annihilate games

achievements.name: Attrition
achievements.description: End 25 games with a kill:death ratio greater than 2:1

achievements.description: Win 100 Victory Point games

achievements.name: M.01 - German Engineering
achievements.description: Kill a German tank with a German AT Gun

achievements.name: M.01 - Compassion in War
achievements.description: Rescue the trapped civilians

achievements.name: M.01 - Soviet Zeal
achievements.description: Complete Mission 01 without calling in additional Shock Troops

achievements.name: M.02 - What's Mine is Mine
achievements.description: Defend the trainyard without placing any mines on the roads

achievements.name: M.02 - Invaluable Resources
achievements.description: Keep the Shock Troops alive throughout Mission 2

achievements.name: M.03 - Something Borrowed
achievements.description: Capture at least 3 enemy weapons on the Ridge

achievements.name: M.03 - Mtsensk Mine Field
achievements.description: Place at least 10 mines before the village defense

achievements.name: M.03 - Hardened Armor
achievements.description: Re-take the Ridge without losing a vehicle on General difficulty

achievements.name: M.04 - Revenge
achievements.description: Destroy all 10 tanks in Mission 4

achievements.name: M.04 - Cool Efficiency
achievements.description: Take all three German outposts in Mission 4 using only snipers

achievements.name: M.05 - Some Room to Breathe
achievements.description: Locate and destroy the enemy howitzers in Stalingrad

achievements.name: M.05 - Help from the North
achievements.description: Secure the Northern bridge in Stalingrad

achievements.name: M.05 - The Silent Organs
achievements.description: Complete Mission 5 without firing the Katyusha rockets

achievements.name: M.06 - Scout vs. Sniper
achievements.description: Kill at least 3 snipers with an M3A1 Scout Car

achievements.name: M.06 - Get Out of the Truck!
achievements.description: Destroy all the German halftracks

achievements.name: M.06 - Repel and Repair
achievements.description: Complete the mission with at least 50 percent HQ integrity on General difficulty

achievements.name: M.07 - Direct Fire
achievements.description: Complete the mission without capturing or deploying a Mortar

achievements.name: M.07 - Suchka Specialist
achievements.description: Earn three ranks of veterancy with an SU-76

achievements.name: M.07 - Point Blank Demolition
achievements.description: Destroy the German strongholds from close range on General difficulty

achievements.name: M.08 - No Help Needed
achievements.description: Complete the “Hunt” without calling in any additional troops

achievements.name: M.09 - All on Your Own
achievements.description: Complete Mission 9 without reestablishing radio communication

achievements.name: M.09 - The Spice of Life
achievements.description: Create all available types of tank in Mission 9

achievements.name: M.10 - Glass Cannons
achievements.description: Destroy an Elefant or all Pak-43s before they destroy a vehicle

achievements.name: M.10 - Gate Crusher
achievements.description: Breach the gate without losing an ISU-152 on General difficulty

achievements.name: M.11 - Armia Krajowa
achievements.description: Mobilize all three types of partisan troops during the fight

achievements.name: M.11 - Snipe the driver
achievements.description: Snipe the driver of a moving Opel truck

achievements.name: M.12 - Howitzer Hunter
achievements.description: Destroy all of the German Howitzers in the city of Poznan

achievements.name: M.12 - Solo Commander
achievements.description: Capture both squares in Poznan before Colonel-General Kolpakchi’s army does

achievements.name: M.12 - To the Rescue
achievements.description: Find and rescue the Penal Battalions incarcerated in the city of Poznan

achievements.name: M.13 - Halbe Massacre
achievements.description: Allow no Germans to escape the encirclement

achievements.name: M.13 - The Might of the Red Army
achievements.description: Complete the Halbe encirclement without producing any additional units

achievements.name: M.14 - Claimed for the Motherland
achievements.description: Recrew the abandoned StuG, Brummbär and Ostwind

achievements.name: M.14 - Before the Winter
achievements.description: Achieve victory in 60 minutes or less.

achievements.name: M.14 - Boots in the Streets
achievements.description: Complete the mission without building any additional vehicles

achievements.name: Help Indeed
achievements.description: Rescue all three Partizan squads in the Cold Weather challenge

achievements.name: Winter Driver
achievements.description: Recrew and fully repair a Panzer IV tank during the Cold Weather challenge

achievements.name: Gold Weather
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Cold Weather challenge

achievements.name: Massive Destruction
achievements.description: Destroy 75% of the neutral structures during the Indirect Fire Challenge

achievements.name: Rocket Recovery
achievements.description: Recrew all of the Katyusha trucks on the map during the Indirect Fire Challenge

achievements.name: Indirect Gold
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Indirect Fire Challenge

achievements.name: Panzer Theft
achievements.description: Recrew and repair a Panzer IV tank during the Winter Defense Challenge

achievements.name: To the Front
achievements.description: Call in 20 squads of Fresh Conscripts during the Winter Defense Challenge

achievements.name: Gold Defense
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Winter Defense Challenge

achievements.name: Clean Sweep
achievements.description: Clear the entire minefield in the Blitzkrieg Challenge

achievements.name: Armored and Dangerous
achievements.description: Recrew 10 Soviet vehicles during the Blitzkrieg Challenge

achievements.name: Goldkrieg
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Blitzkrieg Challenge

achievements.name: Sharpshooter
achievements.description: Use a Sniper to deliver the killing shot to five Soviet officers during the Officer Assassination Challenge

achievements.name: Scrounger
achievements.description: Pick up 80% of the supply caches on the map during the Officer Assassination Challenge

achievements.name: Gold Assassin
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Officer Assassination Challenge

achievements.name: Hard Shell
achievements.description: Build 3 Panzer IV Medium Tanks during the match during the Defense of Schildkröteberg

achievements.name: Triple Triple

achievements.name: Turtle Gold
achievements.description: Complete all objectives in the Defense of Schildkröteberg

achievements.name: I Need No Help

achievements.name: Panzer Graveyard
achievements.description: Destroy 20 German tanks or assault guns during the Brody Tank War

achievements.name: Cookout
achievements.description: Build 10 Campfires during the General Winter Scenario

achievements.name: Halftracked
achievements.description: Recrew all the abandoned German halftracks on the General Winter Scenario map

achievements.name: In the Noose

achievements.name: Uncompromising
achievements.description: Complete Faceoff at Rostov without the Soviets ever controlling more Victory Points than you do.

achievements.name: Red Dead
achievements.description: Kill 20 squads of Soviet Shock Troops or Penal Battalions during Faceoff at Rostov

achievements.name: Silence the Guns
achievements.description: Destroy the Soviet Artillery positions on the central plateau in the Encirclement at Smolensk

achievements.description: Capture the Lublin market squad without losing a soldier or vehicle
